channel.title: Modpack Tips on ShadowNode Modded Game Servers
channel.description: Recent content in Modpack Tips on ShadowNode Modded Game Servers

item.title: FTB Oceanblock Tips
item.description: Known Issues This list is current as of the time of writing this but might not always be up-to-date. Take advice here with that knoweldge. Below is a current list of known issues with Ocean Block and work arounds (if any) Crate Quest Wont Progress There is no current work around and this is a mod bug. We're waiting on the ModDev and pack to update. Joining an Island Wipes Inventory and Progress Currently if you join a team or island after you're already started the game you will lose all of your currently unlocked quest progress as well as having everything in your inventory wiped.

item.title: MC Eternal Tips
item.description: Disable Agricraft Particles A lot of players use Agricraft as way to enchance the speed at which their crops grow. Typically a single Agricarft spinkler can be used to multiply the speed, however, the effect does stack. This can pose a problem as all the particles from this causes a considerable amount of client-side render time/lag. This means that you will need to disable the particles for optimal FPS and to not lag out while around some bases.
